parameters.name: Random step range [0-100]
parameters.desc: When the robot detects an obstacle, it rotates for a number of control cycles determined by the integer parameter.

Behaviours.name: Phototaxis
Behaviours.desc: The robot goes towards the light source, if perceived.

Behaviours.name: Anti-Phototaxis
Behaviours.desc: The robot goes away from light sources, if perceived.

parameters.name: Attraction factor [0,5]
parameters.desc: Move closer to neighboring peers, with a velocity that depends on the number of robots detected and the attraction factor

parameters.name: Repulsion factor [0,5]
parameters.desc: Move farther from neighboring peers, with a velocity that depends on the number of robots detected and the repulsion factor

parameters.name: Color to which the behaviors react :
parameters.desc: Steady movement towards robots/objects of a specific color.

parameters.name: Color to which the behaviors react :
parameters.desc: Steady movement away from robots/objects of a specific color.
